description.value:
Acts as an ammo charge pack for lasguns or hellguns. Doesn't have have the power for complex machinery like a potentia coil but might be able to charge other simple things. Takes a Full Day to Recharge through internal body heat and movement.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
